backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing user onboarding, profiles, connections, messaging, call states, and access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration stub returning an empty new actor with no data transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific onboarding error-handling feature to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the LensGram app and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication gating, onboarding gating, and top-level app layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing screen shown when the user is not authenticated with branding and login prompt.
frontend/src/components/calls/CallReques: UI panel for initiating, accepting, declining, and ending call requests between users.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main authenticated layout with header, navigation, footer, and content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/PrimaryNa: Top navigation bar linking to Discover, Requests, and Chats with active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/users/UserResult: Displays a user card with avatar, name, and buttons for sending or managing connection requests based on current status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallRequests.ts: Provides hooks for fetching call state and initiating, accepting, declining, or ending calls via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Handles querying messages for a conversation and sending new messages, with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRequests: Manages connection requests, including fetching pending requests, searching profiles, sending, accepting, rejecting, and checking connection status.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnections.ts: Fetches the user's connections and their profiles, plus individual user profile lookup by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves the current user's profile and provides an onboarding mutation to create it.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a minimal hook to check whether the backend actor is ready for use.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSearch.ts: Queries the backend for a user profile matching a provided username.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed chat view for a selected user, loads messages, sends new ones, and includes call request handling.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Lists all connection profiles and lets users navigate into individual chat conversations.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Provides a username search interface to look up users and view connection results.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles new user onboarding by collecting profile info, submitting it, and showing relevant errors.
frontend/src/pages/RequestsPage.tsx: Shows pending connection requests and allows accepting or rejecting each request.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingErrors.ts: Classifies onboarding errors into user-friendly types like unauthorized or username taken.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats timestamps into relative times and message-friendly time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, issues, and requirements for building the LensGram web messenger.
